result.execSummary:
The defendant Christian M Ellifson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Huber with all standard release conditions, commences forthwith
Costs to be paid $25.00 a month commencing 02/01/2023 and each month thereafter until paid in full or penalty of civil judgment for non-payment

**Clerk mailed copy to defendant at the Jail.**
Notice of Completion of Representation filed by Atty. Andrew Herbers

11:57 AM District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Julian Marrufo. Defendant Christian M Ellifson in court, in custody.  Attorney Gutierrez for attorney J Andrew Herbers Jr. in court for Christian M Ellifson. 
Victim rights have been complied with by the Waukesha County District Attorneys Office. 
Court conducts a plea colloquy with defendant. 
Defendant enters a plea of guilty to Count 1. 
Court finds the defendant guilty to Count 1. 

Court orders the following:
100 DAYS  Waukesha County Jail with Huber, all standard release conditions.
52 DAYS CREDIT

COSTS:  $243.00
D/V SURCHARGE: $100.00
DNA SAMPLE AND SURCHARGE:  $200.00 
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid at the rate of $25.00 per month commencing 2/1/23 until paid in full, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
